verses.text_plain: Moreover the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
verses.verse_html: 1Moreover the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.text_plain: Son of man, set thy face against mount Seir, and prophesy against it,
verses.verse_html: 2Son of man, set thy face against mount Seir, and prophesy against it,

verses.text_plain: And say unto it, Thus saith the Lord God; Behold, O mount Seir, I am against thee, and I will stretch out mine hand against thee, and I will make thee most desolate.
verses.verse_html:
3And say unto it, Thus saith the Lord God; Behold, O mount Seir, I am against thee, and I will stretch out mine hand against thee, and I will make thee most desolate. ▼
▼ most…: Heb. desolation and desolation

tokens.text: against thee, and I will stretch out
against thee, and I will make

footnotes.body_html: ▼ most…: Heb. desolation and desolation

verses.text_plain: I will lay thy cities waste, and thou shalt be desolate, and thou shalt know that I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 4I will lay thy cities waste, and thou shalt be desolate, and thou shalt know that I am the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Because thou hast had a perpetual hatred, and hast shed the blood of the children of Israel by the force of the sword in the time of their calamity, in the time that their iniquity had an end:
verses.verse_html:
5Because thou hast had a perpetual hatred, and hast shed the blood of the children of Israel by the force of the sword in the time of their calamity, in the time that their iniquity had an end: ▼
▼ perpetual…: or, hatred of old
 , ▼
▼ shed…: Heb. poured out the children
 , ▼
▼ force: Heb. hands

tokens.text: Because thou hast had a perpetual

footnotes.body_html: ▼ perpetual…: or, hatred of old

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shed…: Heb. poured out the children
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shed…: Heb. poured out the children

verses.text_plain: Therefore, as I live, saith the Lord God, I will prepare thee unto blood, and blood shall pursue thee: sith thou hast not hated blood, even blood shall pursue thee.
verses.verse_html: 6Therefore, as I live, saith the Lord God, I will prepare thee unto blood, and blood shall pursue thee: sith thou hast not hated blood, even blood shall pursue thee.

verses.text_plain: Thus will I make mount Seir most desolate, and cut off from it him that passeth out and him that returneth.
verses.verse_html:
7Thus will I make mount Seir most desolate, and cut off from it him that passeth out and him that returneth. ▼
▼ most…: Heb. desolation and desolation

tokens.text: from it him that passeth out

footnotes.body_html: ▼ most…: Heb. desolation and desolation

verses.text_plain: And I will fill his mountains with his slain men: in thy hills, and in thy valleys, and in all thy rivers, shall they fall that are slain with the sword.
verses.verse_html: 8And I will fill his mountains with his slain men: in thy hills, and in thy valleys, and in all thy rivers, shall they fall that are slain with the sword.

verses.text_plain: I will make thee perpetual desolations, and thy cities shall not return: and ye shall know that I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 9I will make thee perpetual desolations, and thy cities shall not return: and ye shall know that I am the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Because thou hast said, These two nations and these two countries shall be mine, and we will possess it; whereas the Lord was there:
verses.verse_html:
10Because thou hast said, These two nations and these two countries shall be mine, and we will possess it; whereas the Lord was there: ▼
▼ whereas…: or, though the Lord was there

tokens.text: shall be mine, and we will possess

footnotes.body_text: ▼ whereas…: or, though the Lord was there
footnotes.body_html: ▼ whereas…: or, though the Lord was there

verses.text_plain: Therefore, as I live, saith the Lord God, I will even do according to thine anger, and according to thine envy which thou hast used out of thy hatred against them; and I will make myself known among them, when I have judged thee.
verses.verse_html: 11Therefore, as I live, saith the Lord God, I will even do according to thine anger, and according to thine envy which thou hast used out of thy hatred against them; and I will make myself known among them, when I have judged thee.

tokens.text: against them; and I will make myself known
among them, when I have judged

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt know that I am the Lord, and that I have heard all thy blasphemies which thou hast spoken against the mountains of Israel, saying, They are laid desolate, they are given us to consume.
verses.verse_html:
12And thou shalt know that I am the Lord, and that I have heard all thy blasphemies which thou hast spoken against the mountains of Israel, saying, They are laid desolate, they are given us to consume. ▼
▼ to consume: Heb. to devour

footnotes.body_html: ▼ to consume: Heb. to devour

verses.text_plain: Thus with your mouth ye have boasted against me, and have multiplied your words against me: I have heard them.
verses.verse_html:
13Thus with your mouth ye have boasted against me, and have multiplied your words against me: I have heard them. ▼
▼ boasted: Heb. magnified

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord God; When the whole earth rejoiceth, I will make thee desolate.
verses.verse_html: 14Thus saith the Lord God; When the whole earth rejoiceth, I will make thee desolate.

verses.text_plain: As thou didst rejoice at the inheritance of the house of Israel, because it was desolate, so will I do unto thee: thou shalt be desolate, O mount Seir, and all Idumea, even all of it: and they shall know that I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 15As thou didst rejoice at the inheritance of the house of Israel, because it was desolate, so will I do unto thee: thou shalt be desolate, O mount Seir, and all Idumea, even all of it: and they shall know that I am the Lord.

tokens.text: unto thee: thou shalt be desolate
all of it: and they shall know
